attributes.action: Stop ageism and pay people the same minimum wage regardless of age
attributes.additional_details: No additional details needed. Everyone has to do exactly the same jobs in their workplace and everyone has bills to pay therefore everyone on minimum wage has the right to earn the same wage.
attributes.background: In England we set different minimum wage based on age. Feminism is condemned in society and yet no one has shon a light on ageism. Everyday people being payed less than others simply because of age? How is this any different to paying men more than women?
